bibl.title: Use and Abuse of Beer and Wine in Graeco-Roman Egypt
bibl.note: A survey of the papyrological documentation.
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Use and Abuse of Beer and Wine in Graeco-Roman Egypt.

Klaus GEUS und Klaus ZIMMERMANN (Hgg.), Punica - Libyca - Ptolemaica. Festschrift für Werner Huss, zum 65. Geburtstag dargebracht von Schülern, Freunden und Kollegen = Studia Phoenicia. 16 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 104 (Leuven - Paris - Sterling, Virginia, 2001) pp. 159-166.
A survey of the papyrological documentation.
